record.title: DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 5, 2007
record.narrative:
DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 5, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H14066]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the business in order under the Calendar Wednesday rule be dispensed with on Wednesday, December 5, 2007.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Hampshire?
